original_title: Afternoon thundershowers possible in several areas today
original_body_lines: A few showers will occur in Northern, Eastern and North-central provinces and Matale District.
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and Galle and Matara districts after 2:00 p.m.
Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Southern provinces in the morning.
The public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
